alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Benton, northwestern Washington, southeastern Delaware and northern Adair Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Christie, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Watts... Proctor... Christie... Cincinnati... Baron... Lake Francis... Savoy... Ballard... Wedington... Gallitin... Summers... Wheeler... Natural Falls State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
